UPDATE manage_deal_order SET orderStatus = 3 WHERE orderId IN (SELECT orderId FROM ( SELECT orderId FROM manage_deal_order WHERE createTime < SUBDATE(NOW(),INTERVAL #{second} SECOND) AND orderStatus = 1 ) AS orderList)
